query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT ,A.POSID ,A.POSID_1 ,(SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE2 = A.ZZACTSS) AS ZZACTSS ,A.ZSPEC1 ,A.ZSPEC2 ,A.ZZCHAKD ,A.ZZCOMP2 ,'¹ÌÀÔ·Â' AS CRDAT ,DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(SUBSTR(ZZCHAKD,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(ZZCHAKD,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(ZZCHAKD,7,2)) AS DAYS ,A.NAMET ,(SELECT Z.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = A.MANDT AND Z.LIFNR = A.LIFNR) AS LIFNR ,A.NAMET2 ,A.TXT30 ,A.TXT04 ,0 AS PRO_R ,C.ZSITE_NM ,CASE ZZGUBUN WHEN '10' THEN 'EL' WHEN '11' THEN 'ES' WHEN '12' THEN 'MW' WHEN '20' THEN '' ELSE '' END AS ZZGUBUN ,ZZILSIC ,ZZJUNGO FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS C ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0112 AS B ON A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT
AND B.PSPID LIKE #PSPID#||'%'
AND A.POSID = B.PSPID AND A.POSID_1 = B.POSID WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.POSID = C.POSID AND A.ZZCHAKG = 'X' AND A.ZZJUNGO = '' AND A.ZZCHAKD > '00000000' AND A.ZZCHAKD < HEX(CURRENT DATE - 1 MONTH) AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE 'G%' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE 'E%' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______Y%' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______T%' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______G%' AND B.MANDT IS NULL
AND A.POSID LIKE #PSPID#||'%'
AND A.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND A.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND A.ZZGUBUN IN (#GUBUN+#)
AND RTRIM(A.ZZILSIC) = ''
AND RTRIM(A.ZZJUNGO) = ''
UNION ALL
SELECT A.MANDT ,A.POSID ,A.POSID_1 ,(SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE2 = A.ZZACTSS) AS ZZACTSS ,A.ZSPEC1 ,A.ZSPEC2 ,A.ZZCHAKD ,A.ZZCOMP2 ,B.CRDAT ,DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(SUBSTR(ZZCHAKD,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(ZZCHAKD,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(ZZCHAKD,7,2)) AS DAYS ,A.NAMET ,(SELECT Z.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = A.MANDT AND Z.LIFNR = A.LIFNR) AS LIFNR ,A.NAMET2 ,A.TXT30 ,A.TXT04 ,PRO_R ,C.ZSITE_NM ,CASE ZZGUBUN WHEN '10' THEN 'EL' WHEN '11' THEN 'ES' WHEN '12' THEN 'MW' WHEN '20' THEN '' ELSE '' END AS ZZGUBUN ,ZZILSIC ,ZZJUNGO FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS C ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS A, (SELECT X1.MANDT,X1.PSPID,X1.POSID,SUM(X1.PRO_R) AS PRO_R,MAX(X1.CRDAT) AS CRDAT,DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(SUBSTR(MAX(X1.CRDAT),1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(MAX(X1.CRDAT),5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(MAX(X1.CRDAT),7,2)) AS DAYS FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0112 AS X1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS X2 ON X1.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X1.PSPID = X2.POSID AND X1.POSID = X2.POSID_1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.ZZCHAKD > '00000000' AND X2.POSID_1 NOT LIKE 'G%' AND X2.POSID_1 NOT LIKE 'E%' AND X2.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______Y%' AND X2.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______T%' AND X2.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______G%'
AND X1.PSPID LIKE #PSPID#||'%'
AND X2.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND X2.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND X2.ZZGUBUN IN (#GUBUN+#)
AND RTRIM(X2.ZZILSIC) = ''
AND RTRIM(X2.ZZJUNGO) = ''
GROUP BY X1.MANDT,X1.PSPID,X1.POSID HAVING SUM(X1.PRO_R) BETWEEN 0 AND 94 AND MAX(X1.CRDAT) < HEX(CURRENT DATE - 1 MONTH) ) AS B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.POSID = B.PSPID AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.POSID = C.POSID AND A.POSID_1 = B.POSID AND A.ZZCHAKD > '00000000' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE 'G%' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE 'E%' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______Y%' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______T%' AND A.POSID_1 NOT LIKE '______G%'
AND A.POSID LIKE #PSPID#||'%'
AND A.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND A.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND A.ZZGUBUN IN (#GUBUN+#)
AND RTRIM(A.ZZILSIC) = ''
AND RTRIM(A.ZZJUNGO) = ''
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
